meanings.definition: Not conducive to good health; unhealthy.
meanings.sent1: Eating fast food every day is the unhealthiest choice for your body.
meanings.sent2: It is important to avoid the unhealthiest foods to stay fit and strong.
meanings.sent3: Choosing to eat only candy for breakfast would be the unhealthiest decision!
meanings.sent4: Her lifestyle was like a race to find the unhealthiest habits possible.
meanings.sent5: The unhealthiest snacks were always the most tempting at the store.

meanings.sent1: Out of all the options, the unhealthiest meal was chosen by the group.
meanings.sent2: She always picked the unhealthiest desserts on the menu.
meanings.sent3: The unhealthiest drink at the party was a mix of soda and sugary syrups.
meanings.sent4: His room was like a museum of the unhealthiest snacks imaginable.
meanings.sent5: The unhealthiest habits can sometimes be the hardest to break.
